description: This file contains Data Transfer Object (DTO) classes for the Driver API in a taxi booking backend system. It defines request and response DTOs, including CreateDriverRequest, UpdateAvailabilityRequest, DriverResponse, and VehicleDto, with validation and schema annotations.

classes.name: CreateDriverRequest
classes.description: DTO for creating a new driver, includes driver name, vehicle make, model, and license plate number with validation and schema annotations.

classes.name: UpdateAvailabilityRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating driver availability status, referencing DriverStatus enum.

classes.name: DriverResponse
classes.description: Response DTO representing driver details including id, name, status, and associated vehicle.

classes.name: VehicleDto
classes.description: DTO representing vehicle details: id, make, model, and plate number.
